```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(timetk)
library(reactable)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, comment = NA)
```

```{r generate-data, eval = FALSE, echo = FALSE}
set.seed(20210422)

d_dates <- seq(as.Date('2018/01/01'), as.Date(Sys.Date()), by="day")

d_models <- c(rep("A", 5), rep("S", 3), rep("X", 2))

d_regions <- c("North America", "Latin America", "EMEA", "APAC")

sales <- tibble(
  date = sample(d_dates, 7000, replace = TRUE),
  model = sample(d_models, 7000, replace = TRUE),
  shipping = round(runif(7000, 25, 150), 2),
  region = sample(d_regions, 7000, replace = TRUE),
) %>% 
  mutate(price = case_when(model == "A" ~ 699,
                           model == "S" ~ 999,
                           model == "X" ~ 2499),
         cost = case_when(model == "A" ~ 543,
                           model == "S" ~ 804,
                           model == "X" ~ 2238),
         returning = case_when(model == "A" ~ sample(c(rep("yes", 1), rep("no", 20)), 7000, replace = TRUE),
                               model == "S" ~ sample(c(rep("yes", 1), rep("no", 2)), 7000, replace = TRUE),
                               model == "X" ~ sample(c(rep("yes", 3), rep("no", 1)), 7000, replace = TRUE))) %>% 
  arrange(date) %>% 
  mutate(id = row_number()) %>% 
  select(id, date, model, price, cost, shipping, region, returning)

write.csv(sales, "sales.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```

```{r}
sales <- read_csv("sales.csv") %>% 
  mutate(net = price - cost - shipping) %>% 
  filter(region == "North America") %>% 
  filter_by_time(date, Sys.Date()-365, Sys.Date())
```

# Sales Summary - North America

This report summarizes sales of our 3 products in the North America region between April 23, 2020 and April 22, 2021.

## Monthly Sales {.tabset .tabset-pills}

### Chart

```{r}
monthly_sales_by_model <- sales %>% 
  group_by(model) %>% 
  summarize_by_time(date, "month", sales = n())

monthly_sales_by_model %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  plot_time_series(date, sales, .color_var = model, .smooth = FALSE, .interactive = FALSE,
                   .title = "Monthly Sales by Model - Last 12 Months",
                   .color_lab = "Model")
```

### Data

```{r}
reactable(monthly_sales_by_model,
          resizable = TRUE,
          filterable = TRUE,
          searchable = TRUE)
```

## Anomalies

```{r}
monthly_sales_by_model %>% 
  plot_anomaly_diagnostics(date, sales, .alpha = .25)
```

## Profit

```{r}
ggplot(sales, aes(x = model, y = net, color = model)) +
  geom_jitter(alpha = .25) +
  geom_point(stat = "summary", size = 5) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(legend.position = "none") +
  labs(title = "Profit by Model",
       x = "Model",
       y = "Profit")
```

## New vs. returning customers

```{r}
sales_by_returning <- sales %>% 
  group_by(returning, model) %>% 
  count()

sales_by_returning %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = returning, y = n, fill = model)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", position = "dodge") +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(title = "Sales by Model and New vs. Returning Customer",
       x = "Returning customer?",
       y = "Sales",
       fill = "Model")
  
```
